ta.title: ரூ. 145,000 கருவூல மசோதா ஏலம் 20 ஆம் தேதி
body_lines: ஏலத்திற்கான ஏலங்களை ஏற்றுக்கொள்வது நவம்பர் 20 மதியம் மற்றும் குறைந்தபட்ச அளவு ரூ.

en.title: Rs. 145,000 Treasury bill auction on 20th
body_lines: The Central Bank announced that a Treasury bill auction worth Rs. 20 million million million.
The Central Bank announces that the acceptance of the bids for the auction will be held on November 20 noon and the minimum amount of Rs.

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:
Central Bank announces Treasury bill auction: Rs. 145,000 crore on Nov 20. Acceptance of bids at noon. Minimum bid amount not specified.
